description: The U.S., U.K. and other allies are vowing to support Israel in its defense against a drone attack launched by Iran. CBS News contributor Robert Berger and Andrew Boyd, former chief of operations in the CIA's Counterterrorism Mission Center, break down how Israel and its allies are responding.
title: Israel's allies react to Iran's drone attack

description: CBS News contributor Andrew Boyd, former chief of operations in the CIA's Counterterrorism Mission Center, weighs in on the preparations and potential responses to Iran's drone attack on Israel on Saturday night. The attack is likely to unfold over several hours and Boyd says it could be followed by further escalation.
title: Former CIA official on possible responses to Iran's attack on Israel

description: The Israel Defense Forces and U.S. officials say a drone attack launched from Iranian territory is on its way to Israel, but it may take hours for the drones to reach their targets if they're not shot down first. CBS News' Imtiaz Tyab, Olivia Gazis and national security contributor Sam Vinograd have more.
title: Iranian drones launched, could take hours to get to Israel

description: U.S. officials confirm a drone attack has been launched from Iranian territory against Israel. CBS News' Margaret Brennan reports the White House is expecting the initial wave of drones to be one part of a larger attack that could last hours.
title: White House: Drones launched from Iran against Israel likely first wave of larger attack

description: Iran has launched a drone attack toward Israel, the Israeli military said Saturday evening. The Israel Defense Forces (IDF) vowed to protect the country and ordered changes to its defensive guidelines, closing schools and limiting crowded gatherings. CBS News contributor Robert Berger and foreign correspondent Imtiaz Tyab are following the latest developments.
title: Israeli officials warn civilians after Iran launches drone attacks

description: IDF spokesperson Rear Adm. Daniel Hagari says Israel is "closely monitoring Iranian killer drones that are en route to Israel, sent by Iran. This is a severe and dangerous escalation." U.S. officials have confirmed a drone attack has been launched from Iranian territory.
title: Israel calls drone attack from Iranian soil a severe escalation

description: The attack is in retaliation for an April 1 Israeli strike on an Iranian consulate in Damascus, Syria, which killed seven members of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps.
title: Israel launches drones toward Israel in retaliatory attack

description: The third round of the Masters tournament is underway at Augusta National Golf Club. Max Homa, Scottie Scheffler and Bryson DeChambeau open play today tied atop the leaderboard, but one of the biggest stars is the course itself. With its lush greens and dozens of varieties of plants and flowers. It's a standard most other golf courses try to meet.
title: The third round of the Masters tournament is underway, but the biggest star is the course itself

description: Local reports say pedestrian was visiting Hawaii from Illinois
title: Hawaii cruise shuttle driver presses gas not brake killing 1 pedestrian, injuring others

description: Container ship seized by Iran's Revolutionary Guard near Strait of Hormuz amid tensions; George and Linda Meyers are the couple behind "Cook in Tuscany."
title: 4/13: Saturday Morning

description: Fisk University student​ Morgan Price clinched the title with an all-around score of 39.225.
title: HBCU gymnast Morgan Price wins national collegiate title in historic first

description: Monday marks the 77th anniversary of Jackie Robinson's debut in Major League Baseball. When he took first base for the Brooklyn Dodgers, Robinson ended 80 years of segregation in baseball. Decades earlier, a team of Black players were making a name for themselves in the independent leagues of the Midwest. Now, nearly 100 years later, those players and their contributions to baseball are getting their just due and inspiring a new generation of players.
title: Contributions of Black players in baseball being celebrated

description: New York native Alynda Segarra, a singer-songwriter, left home at 17 to travel the country and perform music. In 2008, Segarra was called "one of America's best songwriters." Now, 16 years later, Hurray for the Riff Raff has released their ninth studio album. From "The Past is Still Alive," here is Hurray for the Riff Raff with "Alibi."
title: Saturday Sessions: Hurray for the Riff Raff performs "Alibi"

description: New York native Alynda Segarra, a singer-songwriter, left home at 17 to travel the country and perform music. In 2008, Segarra was called "one of America's best songwriters." Now, 16 years later, Hurray for the Riff Raff has released their ninth studio album. From "The Past is Still Alive," here is Hurray for the Riff Raff with "Hawkmoon."
title: Saturday Sessions: Hurray for the Riff Raff performs "Hawkmoon"

description: George and Linda Meyers are the couple behind "Cook in Tuscany," turning their love for the region into an opportunity for others.
title: George and Linda Meyers are the couple behind "Cook in Tuscany"

description: New York native Alynda Segarra, a singer-songwriter, left home at 17 to travel the country and perform music. In 2008, Segarra was called "one of America's best songwriters." Now, 16 years later, Hurray for the Riff Raff has released their ninth studio album. From "The Past is Still Alive," here is Hurray for the Riff Raff with "Buffalo."
title: Saturday Sessions: Hurray for the Riff Raff performs "Buffalo"

description: In New York, we tour a unique museum that’s home to an extensive collection of toys, games and playgrounds. Then, we sit down with NBA superstar Steph Curry to discuss his heartwarming new children’s book. Watch these stories and more on "Eye on America" with host Michelle Miller.
title: Eye on America: Inside the Museum of Play, and Steph Curry’s new book

description: Writer Caleb Carr is back with a new book called "My Beloved Monster: Masha, the Half-Wild Rescue Cat who Rescued Me" after appearing to walk away from his career.
title: Writer Caleb Carr is back with a new book after walking away from his career

description: Keith Lee's commitment to the little guy has earned him the title of "The People's Champ."  His viral food reviews are the hallmark of community and an effort to democratize the food space. Now, it's known as "The Keith Lee Effect."
title: Keith Lee's viral food reviews are the hallmark of community

description: Former President Donald Trump said that a recent Arizona Supreme Court ruling went too far in restricting abortion access. He said abortion rights is an issue that should be decided on a state-by-state basis.
title: Trump said that a recent Arizona Supreme Court ruling went too far in restricting abortion

description: The disappearance of 14-year-old Binyamin Achimair sparked attacks by Israeli settlers on Palestinian villages on Friday and Saturday.
title: Body found of missing teen whose disappearance sparked deadly settler attack

description: Spencer, the official mascot of the Boston Marathon, is honored by his community. David Begnaud introduces us to a woman who calls herself a "bad weather friend" – because she's there when you need her most. Plus, more heartwarming stories.
title: The Uplift: A bad weather friend

description: New video shows a group raiding a container ship in the Gulf of Oman near the Strait of Hormuz. Iran state media said Revolutionary Guard commandos carried out the attack and seized control of the ship. Today, the Israeli Army vowed Iran will bear consequences for escalating tension after President Biden warned Friday that any attack by Iran would be a grave mistake.
title: Container ship seized by Iran's Revolutionary Guard near Strait of Hormuz amid tensions

description: George Schappell and sister Lori, of Reading, Pa., were the world's oldest conjoined twins, according to the Guinness Book of World Records.
title: Lori and George Schappell, world's oldest living conjoined twins, dead at 62

description: Former President Donald Trump hosted House Speaker Mike Johnson at his Mar-a-Lago resort. It was the first time the two have appeared together publicly since Johnson was voted in as speaker last October.
title: Former President Donald Trump hosted House Speaker Mike Johnson at his Mar-a-Lago resort

description: On this edition of CBS Mornings Deals, Ashley Bellman shows us items that might just become essentials in your everyday life. Visit cbsdeals.com to take advantage of these exclusive deals today. CBS earns commissions on purchases made through cbsdeals.com.
title: Exclusive discounts from CBS Mornings Deals

description: As the region braces itself for further conflict, several countries have warned their citizens against travel to Israel. The U.S. Department of State is warning American diplomats not to travel outside Tel Aviv or Jerusalem, while the U.K. advised citizens to leave Israel if they can.
title: State Department issues travel warning to American diplomats

description:
There was a serious security situation in the West Bank after dozens of Israeli settlers stormed into a Palestinian village, setting fire to homes and cars while firing guns at residents. Settlers were searching for a missing 14-year-old boy from their settlement. One Palestinian is dead and 25 others are injured. Also, iconic fashion designer Roberto Cavalli has died.
All that and all that matters in today’s Eye Opener.
title: Eye Opener: Village stormed in search for missing boy

description: Late on Friday night, 26 barges broke free along the Ohio River. Now, the recovery effort has begun.
title: More than 20 barges break loose on Ohio River, recovery efforts underway

description: Here's how much the winner took home last year, and what other golfers made.
title: How big is the Masters purse, and how much of it does the winner get?

description: Here's how and when to watch today's Bournemouth vs. Manchester United Premier League match.
title: How to watch today's Bournemouth vs. Manchester United Premier League soccer match: Livestream options, more

description: Find out how and when to stream the Manchester City vs. Luton Premier League match live.
title: How to watch today's Manchester City vs. Luton Town Premier League soccer match: Livestream options, more

description: The 2024 Masters Tournament is in full swing. Find out how and when to watch, and the leaderboard surprises shocking Augusta.
title: How to watch the 2024 Masters Tournament: Livestream options, full schedule, more

description: Late on Friday night, 26 barges broke free along the Ohio River. Now, the recovery effort has begun.
title: More than 20 barges break loose on Ohio River, recovery efforts underway

description: The incident comes amid heightened tensions between Iran and the West, particularly after a suspected Israeli strike on the Iranian Consulate in Syria.
title: Video shows raid on ship near Strait of Hormuz amid growing tensions

description: New South Wales Assistant Police Commissioner Anthony Cooke said that he believed that the suspect acted alone.
title: 5 dead, suspect killed after stabbing attack at Australia shopping center

description: 1 dead, over a dozen injured after big rig crashes into Texas DPS office; Billy Joel plays 100th show at Madison Square Garden
title: 4/12: CBS Evening News

description: Democratic Gov. Laura Kelly's actions set up a series of confrontations with the Republican-supermajority Legislature over those issues.
title: Kansas governor vetoes ban on gender-affirming care for minors

description: Lana Zak reports on a potential attack from Iran on Israel, what Americans are experiencing this allergy season, and a preview of Coachella.
title: 4/12: CBS News Weekender

description: A White House official says the U.S. is adjusting its posture in the Middle East as it monitors escalating tensions between Israel and Iran. CBS News national security contributor Sam Vinograd joins with analysis.
title: How an Iranian attack on Israel could impact the Middle East

description: The annual two-weekend Coachella music festival began Friday in Indio, California, with the most sluggish ticket sales in 10 years. Paul Thompson, a Pitchfork contributor attending the festival, has covered the event for several years and joins CBS News to discuss the latest.
title: Coachella 2024 kicks off with slowest ticket sales in a decade

description: House Speaker Mike Johnson and former President Donald Trump unveiled a bill Friday that would ban noncitizens from voting in elections, despite it already being illegal. CBS News chief election and campaign correspondent Robert Costa reports.
title: Trump, Johnson unveil bill to ban something that is already illegal

description: If you're looking to buy a new pair of headphones, save some cash with some of our favorite picks that are on sale now.
title: The best deals on headphones for crystal-clear audio at affordable prices

description: If it's time to replace you're vehicle's tires here are some of the best deals you'll find right now.
title: Best tire deals to shop this spring

description: Mexico City, one of the world's most populated cities with nearly 22 million people, could run out of water in months. Florencia Gonzalez Guerra, an investigative video journalist, joins CBS News to examine the causes behind the crisis.
title: What's fueling Mexico City's water crisis?

description: Springtime is the sneezing season for millions of Americans with allergies. Joel Brooks, pediatric allergist at Columbia University's Irving Medical Center, joins CBS News to discuss how severe things are this year and tips for treatment.
title: Is allergy season getting worse? Here's what an allergist says

description: Vice President Kamala Harris campaigned in Arizona Friday, where she blamed former President Donald Trump for the Arizona Supreme Court ruling earlier this week which could pave the way to revive a near-total abortion ban. Janet Shamlian has more.
title: Kamala Harris campaigns in Arizona, blames Trump for abortion ruling

description: Billy Joel is marking his 100th show of his record-breaking residency at New York City's Madison Square Garden. He's played the famed arena since 1978, and Sunday night you can watch his first-ever show to be broadcast on television on CBS.
title: Billy Joel plays 100th show at Madison Square Garden

description: House Speaker Mike Johnson traveled to Mar-a-Lago Friday, where he met with former President Donald Trump. Johnson is hoping to get some public support from Trump amid ongoing criticism from some Republicans who claim he is not delivering, and a threat to his speakership from Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene. Robert Costa reports from Palm Beach.
title: House Speaker Mike Johnson visits Trump at Mar-a-Lago

description: This week's total solar eclipse brought millions of Americans together for a moment of inspiration and awe. That includes CBS's Steve Hartman and his family in this week's "On the Road."
title: Steve Hartman goes "On the Road" to catch a glimpse of the eclipse
